TopicTitle: Minor Suggestion: Separate Biomes for Space High/Low over the Sun's Poles

Articles.Content:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ulysses_(spacecraft)

This would provide a reason for players to send an out of ecliptic mission, and if there is a contract for doing so it could teach players how to use gravity assists, as it will be very hard to get into solar polar orbit without one, like the real Ulysses spacecraft used.

The time budget for going solar polar is even worse than the fuel budget if you get out near Eeloo or further to make the plane change them back sunward to get that low in space over the sun science.  It would be a great challenge
